translation.en: What is your opinion on the movie Jaws?
translation.hi_ng: philm joz par aapakee kya raay hai?

translation.en: To be honest, I find shark movies to be terrifying.
translation.hi_ng: sach kahoon, to mujhe shaark philmen bhayaanak lagatee hain.

translation.en: I can't say I blame you. The movie definitely makes that fear worse!
translation.hi_ng: main yah nahin kah sakata ki main tumhen dosh deta hoon. philm nishchit roop se us dar ko badatar bana detee hai!

translation.en: Did you know that this film was based on a book?
translation.hi_ng: Kya tumhe pata hai ki ye film ek book par based hai.

translation.en: No, I didn't. Not surprised though. Most movies tend to be.
translation.hi_ng: Nahi , maine nahi. Lekin mein surprise nahi hun zyadatar movies mein aisa hi hota hai.

translation.en: I do love the Jaws music though.
translation.hi_ng: Lekin Jaws ka music mujhe pasand hai.

translation.en: Agreed, it heightens the tension and makes it scarier, but that's kind of the point.
translation.hi_ng: Agreed, ye tension ko badhata hai aur isko aur daravana banata hai, lekin shayad uska wahi point hai.

translation.en: Are you surprised at how high the rating is for the film's critic score? And if I heard the music while driving, I would think someone was coming to take me out. Haha
translation.hi_ng: Kya aap surprised hain ki is film ki critic score rating itni high hai ? Aur agar mein iska music driving karte samay sunoon to mujhe lagega ki koi mujhe maarne aa raha hai. Haha

translation.en: 97% is incredibly high, I would have thought that there would be at least some people throwing low scores in there somewhere.
translation.hi_ng: 97% bahut zyada high hai , mujhe laga ki kam se kam kuch log to low scores denge.

translation.en: Do you agree that it's a "cheerfully perverse" scare movie?
translation.hi_ng: Kya aap sehmat hai ki ye "cheerfully perverse" daravani movie hai ?

translation.en:
That's what I thought as well. Maybe it's because it was never done before in it's time and was so different when it came out? It might be easier to "give it a pass" 

And I would say it could be "cheerfully perverse" depending on the kind of movies you enjoy.
translation.hi_ng: Mujhe bhi aisa hi lagta hai. Shayad isliye kyunki us zamane mein aisa pehle nahi hua tha aur jo nikal ke aaya wo kafi alag tha ? Usko ""give it a pass" dena easier hoga aur mein kahunga ki ye "cheerfully perverse" depending on aap kaisi movies pasand karte hain.

translation.en: Do you think that it "is too gruesome for children"?
translation.hi_ng: Kya aapko lagta hai ki it "is too gruesome for children"?

translation.en: For small children, yes. I could see them having nightmares.
translation.hi_ng: Chhote bacchon ke liye haan, unko nightmares aa sakte hain.

translation.en: I definitely agree with that. I do find it odd that it is considered a "Thriller" film.
translation.hi_ng: main definitely isase agree karta hoon. Mujhe yah ajeeb lagata hai ki ise ek "Thriller" film maana jaata hai.

translation.en: I think it's interesting that in the key scenes it describes the economic impact on a beach town of the shark attacks. Makes you wonder if they'd cover something like that up to make more money in real life.
translation.hi_ng: mujhe lagata hai ki yah interesting hai ki key scenes mein yah  shark attacks ke ek beach town pareconomic impact ka baare main batata hai. Aapako aashchary hota hai ki kya ve real life mein adhik paisa banaane ke lie aisa kuchh cover karenge.

translation.en: In today's society, I think that would absolutely be the case. Even if there was a bounty hunter hired, they would probably go, "Nothing to see here, have fun!"
translation.hi_ng: aaj ke society mein, mujhe lagata hai ki aisa hee hoga. yahaan tak ​​ki agar ek bounty hunter ko kaam par rakha gaya tha, to ve shaayad bolengain, "yahaan dekhane ke lie kuchh bhee nahin hai, maze karo!"

translation.en: I find it interesting that they put it in a fictional "New England resort town". You would think they would've picked somewhere in California since there's so many beaches and how huge it is.
translation.hi_ng: mujhe yah interesting lagata hai ki unhonne ise fictional  "New England resort town" mein rakha tha. Aapako lagata hai ki ve Californiamein kaheen aur le gae hote kyonki vahaan bahut saare beaches hain aur yah kitana vishaal hai.

translation.en: Agreed, there typically aren't many shark attacks in New England, usually further south or on the west coast.
translation.hi_ng: Main ye maanta hoon ki , aamataur par  New England mein bahut saare shark attacks nahin hote hain, aamataur par south mein ya west coast par.

translation.en: I can't imagine I would keep going to the beach as a tourist if lots of people kept turning up dead.
translation.hi_ng: main imagine nahin kar sakata ki main ek tourist ke roop mein  beacht par jata rahoongan , agar bahut saare log marate hue paaye jate rahein.

translation.en: I agree. The movie is kind of silly the more you think about it. Especially when people keep believing the town and beach team that everything is fine. Yet people keep dying? I guess they want you to suspend disbelief. Haha.
translation.hi_ng: Main agree karta hoon. Movie ek tarah se silly hai , jitana bhi aap isake baare mein sochate hain. khaasakar jab log shahar aur beach team par vishvaas karate rahate ki sab kuchh theek hai.phir bhee log marate rahate hain? mujhe lagata hai ki ve chaahate hain ki aap disbelief ko suspend karen. hah।

translation.en: Or you would think that tourists would join in on the bounty to make the money.
translation.hi_ng: ya aapako lagata hai ki tourists paisa banaane ke lie bounty mein shaamil honge.

translation.en: I wasn't aware that there were so many different types of sharks so near to the shore.
translation.hi_ng: mujhe pata nahin tha ki kinaare ke paas itane saare different type ke sharks the.

translation.en: The key scens describes both a tiger shark and a great white.
translation.hi_ng: key scenes main tiger shark aur ek great white, donon ka varnan kiya gaya hai.

translation.en:
I wonder if the mayor is paid off somewhere in the town or gets a cut of the beaches being open? He's far to adamant about keeping them open. 

And I always thought Tiger Sharks were smaller.
translation.hi_ng: Main soch raha tha ki mayor sheher mein kahin paise leta hai ya beach ke khulne pe? Woh beach kholne par bohot adamant tha. Aur mujhe humesha lagta tha ki Tiger Sharks chotti hoti hain.

translation.en: I always think of Great White's as the huge "Jaws" sharks.
translation.hi_ng: Maine Great Whites ko humesha unn badi "Jaws" sharks ki tarah socha hai.

translation.en: It seems odd that they don't ask a scientist or marine biologist at some point to intervene.
translation.hi_ng: Ajeeb hai ki woh kissi scientist ya marine biologist ko beech mein nahi laa rahe.

translation.en: Even the last key scene describes a pretty limited plan to hook the shark or harpoon it.
translation.hi_ng: Last scene mein bhi bohot hi limited plan hai shark ko hook ya harpoon karne ka.

translation.en: I agree. They have an "Oceanographer" to help determine a shark attack. But no scientists ever get brought in to help the situation.
translation.hi_ng: Sahi, I agree. Unke paas shark attack determine karne ke liye ek "Oceanographer" hai. Par koi scientists nahi laaye help karne ke liye.

translation.en: It seems like a pretty poor plan, and they end up having to make it up as they go along.
translation.hi_ng: Kaafi bekar plan hai, aur aage jaate jaate woh plan banaate jaa rahe hain.

translation.en: It seems crazy that a shark could take out a "Shark-proof" cage.
translation.hi_ng: Kitna crazy hai ki shark ne "shark-proof" cage todd diya.

translation.en: Plus, the reward of only $10,000 seems pretty low to risk lives.
translation.hi_ng: Aur, $10,000 ka reward bohot kam hai life risk karne ke liye.

translation.en: Maybe it was worth a lot more in 1975?
translation.hi_ng: Shayad 1975 mein isse zyaada worth tha.

translation.en: I agree. Not worth it to me. I'll go on vacation in NYC instead and avoid the shark. Haha.
translation.hi_ng: Haan. Mere liye toh worth nahi hai. Shark ko chhod ke, main NYC vacation par chala jaoonga. Haha.

translation.en: And it was definitely worth more in 1975. I just don't know how much.
translation.hi_ng: Aur yeh 1975 Definitely adhik kimat ka hoga.me nahi janti how much.

translation.en: What do we chat about?
translation.hi_ng: Hum kis baare mein chat karein

translation.en: I’ve seen it but a while back.
translation.hi_ng: maine isey dekha hai par kuch while pehle

translation.en: Since you didn't get the document, I have to give you info to respond to.
translation.hi_ng: Since tumhe document nahi mila, mujhe respond karne ke liye tumhe info deni padegi

translation.en: Okay cool. So whats this movie about?
translation.hi_ng: Okay cool. To movie kis baare mein hai.

translation.en: This was a love story between a man a woman who is now in a nursing home.
translation.hi_ng: Ye ek love story thi jo ek man aur woman ke baare mein hai jo ab nursing home mein hain

translation.en: We see them both in their older days and younger days.
translation.hi_ng: hum un dono ko unke older aur younger days mein dekhte haun

translation.en: How romantic. I like movies like that. Who acts in it?
translation.hi_ng: How romantic. Main aisi movies pasand karta hun. Isme kisne act kiya?

translation.en: This movie made stars out of Ryan Gosling and Rachel McAdams.
translation.hi_ng: Is movie ne Rachel McAdams aur Ryan Gosling ko star bana diya

translation.en: Ryan Gosling is the best, so this is the movie that made him big. Is it a period piece?
translation.hi_ng: Ryan Gosling best hai, to ye wo movie hai jisne use bada bana diya. Kya ye ek period piece.

translation.en: you could say that, because it starts in 1940
translation.hi_ng: Tum aisa keh sakte ho, because wo 1940 me start hoti hai

translation.en: in the U.S. south
translation.hi_ng: US South me

translation.en: one thing that might surprise fans is that it didn't get great reviews from critics.  they thought it was too sappy
translation.hi_ng: Ek cheez jo fans ko surprise kar sakti hai k use critics se acche reviews nahi mile. Unhe laga bahut sappy thi.

translation.en: Yeah I don’t really listen to critics as most times they get it wrong. Did you think it was too sappy?
translation.hi_ng: Haan main critics ki nahi sunta hu, jyadatar wo log galat rahte hai. Kya tumhe laga tha wo bahut sappy thi?

translation.en: i remember liking it, that it felt like a real love affair
translation.hi_ng: Mujhe to yaad aati hai k maine pasand kiya tha, aisa laga k real love affair hai.

translation.en: they feed me more information the longer we chat.
translation.hi_ng: Wo mujhe information dete hai jitna jyada hum chat karte hai

translation.en: Nice. Do you know who directed it?
translation.hi_ng: Nice, tumhe pata hai use kisne direct kiya?

translation.en: the director is named Nick Cassavetes.  his mother actually plays the older version of the female lead
translation.hi_ng: Director ka naam Nick Cassavetes hai, uski mother ne actually older version me female lead ka role play kiya tha

translation.en: Wow that is amazing but maybe would be tough to direct your own Mother. Do you know what rating the movie got like on Rotten Tomato?
translation.hi_ng: Wow ye amazing hai lekin maybe apni mother ko direct karna tough raha hoga. Kya tumhe pata hai Rotten Tomato par is movie ko kya rating mili?

translation.en: That sucks. What was your best scene?
translation.hi_ng: Ye to bura hai. Tumhara best scene konsa tha

translation.en: the next scene they mention is how the girl's mother hides the boy's letters from her, because she doesn't want her daughter to be with him
translation.hi_ng: next scene mein wo mention karte hain ki ladki ki maa kaise boy ke letters ladki se hide karti hai, kyunki wo nahi chahti uski beti uske sath rahe

translation.en: What wouldn’t they want them to be together? Is he a bad boy?
translation.hi_ng: wo unhe sath mein kyun nahi rehne dena chahte? kya wo bad boy hai?

translation.en: she's from a rich family.  he's not.
translation.hi_ng: wo rich family se hai lekin he is not.

translation.en: final scene to discuss:  the mother admits what she's done and gives her daughter the letters
translation.hi_ng: final scene discuss karne ke liye : mother admit karti hau ki usne kya kiya aur daughter ko letter deti hai

translation.en: Okay get it now. I guess that ended up well.
translation.hi_ng: Okay ab samjh aya. I guess ye sahi se end huyi.

translation.en: by then, her daughter had gotten engaged to someone else
translation.hi_ng: tabtak uski daughter kisi aur se engage ho jati hai

translation.en: Oh no, so how did they get back together?
translation.hi_ng: Oh no, fir wo dobara saath kaise milte hain

translation.en: her mom shows her what became of lower-class boy she loved once (he's still lower class).  she didn't want her daughter to struggle with money
translation.hi_ng: uski mom ne usey dikhaya ki ek lower class boy jise wo kabhi pyar karti this uska kya hua (wo abhi bhi lower class hai). Wo nahi chahti thi uski beti money ke liye strugge kare.

translation.en: the daughter just has to decide what's important to her
translation.hi_ng: beti ko bas ye decide karna tha ki uske liye kya important hai

translation.en: in the end, she chooses the lower class guy
translation.hi_ng: akhir mein, wo lower class ladke ko choose karti hai

translation.en: I guess she made the right choice then, to chose her happiness and get with him?
translation.hi_ng: mujhe lagta hai usne right choice li, happiness choose karke aur uske saath ja ke

translation.en: Sounds like a fantastic movie.
translation.hi_ng: ye fantastic movie lag rahi hai

translation.en: Do you know when it was released?
translation.hi_ng: kya tumhe pata hai ki ye kab release huyi thi?

translation.en: That was a while back.
translation.hi_ng: ye to thode while pehle tha

translation.en: yeah
translation.hi_ng: haan

translation.en: Was there any critical reviews or responses about it?
translation.hi_ng: kya iske baare mein kuch critical review aur responses hain?

translation.en: they praise the performances, but criticize the "sappy" writing
translation.hi_ng: Unlogo ne performance ki tarrif ki hai par "sappy" writing ki ninda ki hai.

translation.en: are you a love story fan?
translation.hi_ng: Kya tum love love story ke fan ho?

translation.en: Do you consider it to be one of the classics?
translation.hi_ng: Kya tum ise ek classic mante ho?

translation.en: I like Love stories
translation.hi_ng: Main love stories pasand karti hu.

translation.en: not exactly a classic, maybe.  but pretty good.
translation.hi_ng: nahi pura classic nahi lekin acha lagta hai.

translation.en: i'm surprised the task hasn't ended yet
translation.hi_ng: main surprise hu ki abhi tak task khatam nahi hua.

translation.en: I know.
translation.hi_ng: muje pata hai.

translation.en: It makes me want to watch the movie again.
translation.hi_ng: Yehi cheej mujhe movie phir se dekhne ke liye majboor kar rahi hai.

translation.en: Was there anything about it that you didn’t like?
translation.hi_ng: Kya isme kutch aisa cheej hai jo tum nahi pasand karte ho?

translation.en: oh, i suppose the letter thing was a little annoying.  lots of movies have already done that
translation.hi_ng: Haan thoda annoying tha lakin bahut movies already aisa kar chuke hai .

translation.en: Yeah your right there.
translation.hi_ng: Haan tum wahi ho

translation.en: i think it's safe for us to click "finish conversation".  we've already gone past the number of exchanges needed
translation.hi_ng: Mujhe lagta hai hamara "finish conversation" pe click karna safe hai. Hum already jarurat k number of exchanges se jyada kar chuke hai

translation.en: Well nice talking to you.
translation.hi_ng: Well tumhse baat karna accha laga

translation.en: Hello! How are you doing?
translation.hi_ng: HELLO! KAISA HAAL HAI AAP KA.

translation.en: I'm not able to see the document that we will be discussing. Do you mind telling me what movie it is that we will be talking about?
translation.hi_ng: WOH DOCUMENT JO HUM BAATH KARNEWALE HAIN WOH MUJHE DIKHAYE NAHIN DETA.AAPKO AITRAAZ HAI WOH MOVIE KA NAAM BATANE MEIN JIN KE BAARE MEIN HUM BAATH KARNEWALE HAIN.

translation.en: I don't mean to pester you, but could you please confirm that you are receiving my messages?
translation.hi_ng: MEIN AAPKO PARESHAN NAHIN KARNA CHAHTA HOON LEKIN KYA AAP PLEASE CONFIRM KARENGE KI AAP KO MESSAGES MIL RAHI HAI.

translation.en: I'm sorry, but I am going to have to abort the conversation within the next couple of minutes if I don't receive a response from you.
translation.hi_ng: MEIN MAAFI CHAHTA HOON, LEKIN MUJHE WOH BAATHCHEET KUCH MINUTON MEIN RADD KAR DENA HAI AGAR AAPSE KOYI UTTAR NAHIN MILA TOH.

translation.en: It has now been five minutes since we began this chat. If I have not heard from you within the next minute, I will have to abort this conversation. I am sorry for any inconvenience that this may cause for you.
translation.hi_ng: PAANCH MINUTE HO GAYE HAMARA CHAT SHURO HO KAR. AAPKA UTTAR AGAR MUJHE AGLA MINUTE TAK NAHIN MILA TOH MUJHE YE BAATHCHEET RADD KARNI PADEGI.MEIN MAAFI CHAHTA HOON AGAR AAPKO KUCH ASUVIDHA HO.

translation.en: It is a film directed by Steven Spielberg in 2002 it's a bio graphical crime about the character named Frank Abagnale Whom at a young age ran away from home to commit fraud
translation.hi_ng: WOH EK FILM HAI JO 2002 MEIN STEVEN SPEIELBERG DWARA NIRDESHIT. WOH EK BIOGRAPHICAL APRAADH HAI JO EK KIRDHAR FRANK ABAGNALE  KE BAARE MEIN HAI JO CHOTI UMR MEIN DOKHA KARNE KE LIYE GHAR SE BHAAG GAYA.

translation.en: What is the name of the film?
translation.hi_ng: WOH FILM KA NAAM KYA HAI?

translation.en: Catch me if you can
translation.hi_ng: HO SAKE TO PAKAD MUJHE
